nodes.long_description:
# 3D Coverage Everywhere
- Almost all recognizable cities on Earth are available in True 3D, so you'll likely even be able to visit your own street in Immersive 3D & Street View
- Best 3D Earth quality on the market, enhanced by the **AI-powered ’Upscale 3D Imagery’** feature
# Street View
- Adjustable 8k quality w/ the best rendering fidelity on the platform, offering every **Google** and **Community** Imagery on Earth
- Travel across timelines w/ the Time Travel feature
# Multiplayer
- Explore w/ friends!
# (Add-on) World AI can
- Naturally respond in YOUR OWN language
- Visualize & understand your surroundings on Earth for educational purposes or to simply give fun facts
- Tour you anywhere on Earth if asked
- .. + Much more
# Realistic Graphics
- Natural lighting based on the adjustable day/night cycle
- Lifelike, adaptive Haze option
# Terrain Quality
- 3D quality is fully adjustable, producing realistic 3D by pushing it to extreme detail w/ the best possible performance
# Comfort Settings
- Comfort Options (Snap Turning/Flight Vignette) to prevent motion sickness
- Flight Input Remapping (Customizable Movement Controls)
# Easy Navigation
- Mini-map: auto/manual zoom based on altitude, paired w/ the compass for orientation
- Integrated Google Maps panel
# Hand Tracking
- Fly by simply pointing your index finger
- Rotate by doing a "Steering" gesture w/ your own hands

—

Plus 100s of other features built to enhance the experience in all possible ways. Bon voyage! 🌍
nodes.short_description:
Travel the World in VR. (Best 3D Map Quality & Street View Fidelity on the Market) -
for more info, see: earthquest.site

nodes.long_description:
Quest 2 Game made in Unity with the Cesium Package using the Google Earth Photogrammetry 3d Tiles.

---------------------------------------------
UPDATE v10 !! : hopefully the MOST STABLE and the Update that Simplified the Flight Controlling Mechanic the Most, v10 is meant to finalize the heavy game development for a month or two, however, fixes and improvements will still come if there are any needs for it. this Update adds Controller SUPPORT!!! basically the rest is self explanatory, the update also fixes a bug that due to the collider removal and raycast to prevent going through mesh, even if the Earth's Mesh was not visible in Space, it was still there, so the raycast stopped Player Movement when trying to go down, this was Fortunately FIXED!,

v10.2: the Controllers are now Able to Type on Keyboard to Search and Teleport to a specific Place on Earth, and fixed a bug where the space bar touch collider was small,

v10.3: when you pressed on some specific ui buttons, the code gave an error and every other ui stopped working since they had the same script. this was fixed. 3d Earth Generation to have better quality and faster performance, also loading faster and in larger quantity, we'll have to know if that's the case, if not we'll have to redo the changes in v10.4 :/, another improvement was that flight speed adjustment based on altitude was not efficient, and sometimes caused teleporting instead of flying smoothly, fixed !
https://youtu.be/6s-jkai4_mA
---------------------
nodes.short_description: geography teaching hand tracking passthrough VR app/game on Quest 2 Quest Pro, and Quest 3

nodes.change_log:
WorldLens v46 is finally HERE! 10/09/2025 🌍🌐

This update is a whole new era for WorldLens (WL), WL is no longer just a traveling dream come true, it’s also a technological dream come true: Making everything stunningly easy to use and intuitive, with unbelievable, realistic graphics and performance, and an unreal combination of breathtaking design and amazing new functionality.

It really feels like everything falls into place now:

# Design Overhaul ⚜️

- All UI has been reengineered with a beautiful, fundamental, clean, and consistent design language, meaningfully integrated and kept across the entire application.

- Most interactive components are now accompanied by ‘Interactive Icons’. Now, each button shows a relevant icon instead of always visible text, smoothly fading away when hovered over.

# Street View 👁️ 🕹️

- WL’s Street View loads the highest possible quality as fast as technically possible, but what if we could have a mode meant for speed, that can also reach the highest possible resolutions? This is now available!

- Street View’s ‘Auto’ mode is now the default Street View mode, which can be switched back to the 4k or 8k mode at any time.

- **Street View can now be navigated via Thumbstick controls:** Tilt the Thumbstick forwards or backwards to go forwards or backwards!

# Graphical Upgrades ☀️

- **Massive ‘Haze’ realism update:** Haze has been rethought and carefully crafted to bring haze distances and conditions as close as possible to real life. It will automatically densify close to the ground, producing straight-up realistic views, while naturally adjusting visibility when increasing altitude. || *The haze feature will hide unseen terrain behind the visible range when haze fully densifies and close to ground, this saves performance and increases 3D loading speed.*

- Naturally occurring haze conditions like red-white haze during sunsets & sunrises, pinkish-white before dawn, and purplish haze right after sunset (turning to dark blue) have been added.

- Significantly improved morning, daylight and evening lighting and scattering aiming to very closely imitate real life.

- All of these will significantly increase immersion all while bringing more optimizations and maintaining the unbelievably smooth performance you know!

- Improved UI readability in the sunrise glow.

- Improved Space Transition: Now, when approaching space, stars will smoothly fade in based on altitude, imitating real life altitude space visibility.

# Community Imagery Time Travel 🕰️

- The Street View Time Travel feature is now compatible with Community / User-made Imagery: When there are more community images at an exact location, you are now able to time travel between them. This was the last Google Street View option that was missing from WorldLens!

- Because of this, each community image’s capture date can be viewed!

# Satellite-based Hand Google Maps 🗺️

- Using the hand maps, you are now able to visualize nearby terrain and location labels using satellite maps! (Instead of the previous abstract mapping)

- Location labels look just like on Google Maps, therefore readability should never be an issue.

- Since the 3D maps and satellite maps are essentially the same from above, finding the way around places using the map and the overlaid location labels will now be incredibly easier!

-  The **Street View Coverage Overlay** feature will now also appear transparent: This allows full map visualization while being able to see Street View Coverage. 

# Main Menu (Hub) Title Redesign 🌍

- The app title representation at the top has been updated with a brand new 3D WorldLens logo that adaptively responds to the Earth’s sun light direction, producing atmospheric rays behind the logo when illuminated from the back.

- Improved cloud rendering on the Earth presentation: With smooth fading at the edges and more natural distances from Earth.

# Additional 🔧

- Compass, altitude, and speed stats are now visible even when opening Bookmarks and enlarging the hand map.

- The flying movement stopping motion no longer feels linear. This won’t be noticed by many, but the movement flow should now feel as realistic and natural as possible without changing speed, distance, or other movement factors.

- New ‘Familiar Streets’ Soundtrack: <https://youtu.be/b8rLHssjIS0>

- Improved Multiplayer Avatars, now having a much more polished look while keeping the familiarity and simplicity of the previous version.

- The ‘Search for Place’ coordinate reading system now supports pasting Google Maps URLs as a method of teleportation, automatically extracting the location data and getting you there!

- Manual coordinate writing is also now supported (alongside copy / pasting), this may make coordinate browsing frictionless for some!

- When first loading in and after teleporting somewhere, ‘Terrain Loading Strength’ will now further be auto boosted, reducing initial 3D full loading time to just a few seconds or less (depending on connection speed).

- ‘Bookmarks’ slots will now show “Clear Slot” instead of “Save Location” when that slot holds your current coordinates and is ready to be cleared.

- When enlarged, the hand map is now a bit larger for maximum readability.

- A very rare type of Google Earth crash should now be fixed.

- And lots lots more!

—

This is a massive update, I’ve tested everything as well as I could, but if you encounter ANYTHING that you may think isn’t 100% intentional, please **LET ME KNOW!** 🎧

( contact.worldlens.site )
